How to Contribute ü§î

You can contribute by adding new scripts, improving current scripts or Documentation.Here are some Instructions before making a Pull Request

Here are the steps to Make contribute üë£

  • Create an issue for making any change to code. when issue will be approve you can make a change.
  • Add your file in proper folder with README.md in it. Add requirements.txt if needed.
  • Use Flake8 locally for linting Python Code.(We have linting checks so if your code fails it we will not merge the PR.)

Script Name Author(GitHub username) Short introduction to program

propenster-script propenster This Script gets some system info of the user's device
scrap_github CodePerfectPlus Scrap GitHub user repos and save it in csv
html2pdf hpnightowl convert website to html2pdf
link-scraper oxigen96 scrap link from website using python
remove_punctuation_number remove punctuation/number from text file
countries_trivia propenster Simple trivia quiz game that loads questions and answers from a CSV file
email_scraper CodePerfectPlus scrap all emails from input website
jpeg2Png CodePerfectPlus convert jpeg to png
website-colner CodePerfectPlus clone website with python
alphabet_analyzer natsumi Analyze how common each letter is in the English alphabet
check_weather roopeshvs get the weather of your city
ebook2kindle roopeshvs convert ebook to kindle convert_ebook_to_kindle_format
mp3-download parasgupta44 download mp3 form youtube
imdb-scraper ben-jnr title based and user ratings based search
stackoverflow-parse parijatDhar97 parse so for your errormessage
sudoku-solver basscodeer2808 solve soudku puzzle using backtracking
word-counter p014ri5 count the word
duplicate-image p014ri5 remove duplicate image from pc
cartoonify brtymn cartoonify input image in opencv-python
send-a-email nis130 email sending automation in python
merge-pdfs uditmore99 The above script will merge two PDF's at once !
play-video brtymn play video with open-cv
